message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $8500. Would you be willing to accommodate this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your honesty about your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $9000. It's a fair price considering the value the product brings.
